duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop audit checklist and criteria for QA audits to ensure productivity and quality standards are met.
Review external research and incorporate key findings into quality monitoring programs.
Perform trend and root cause analysis to identify skill and service gaps.
Develop and maintain reporting to collect and analyze activity data, track trends in service quality, and measure the effectiveness of existing processes.
Work with department management to clarify changing procedures and collaborate with training resources to provide training on improved processes.
Compile regular QA reports and provide to management.

education_certification.credential: College degree or equivalent experience preferred
